articles.author: FELIX KIPKEMOI
articles.summary: The second Africa Climate Summit (ACS-2) will be held in Addis Ababa on September 8-10. It will bring together more than 45 heads of state and government, 25,000 delegates, and over 100 speakers. The theme of the summit is Accelerating Global Climate Solutions: Financing for Africa's Resilient and Green Development. It builds on the Nairobi Climate Summit held in 2023. It is expected that leaders will present concrete actions.
